name.value: HSPC Null Value Reason code system

description.value: Select codes from Intermountain Healthcare HDD code sytsem. The codes that describe why data is missing in a given element.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from and copyrighted by Intermountain Healthcare HDD

definition.value: The data element is not applicable therefore no data is recorded.
The desired value is not one of the options in the picklist.
Data is not available to populate the element.
